official.headline: Crisis Stabilized
official.anchor_line: The Council's emergency task force has achieved a temporary stabilization of the BCI system.
official.contextual_reframing: This success underlines our resilient governance structure and the proficient coordination of specialized teams.

underground.headline: Crisis? What Crisis?
underground.anchor_line: The Council's 'stabilization' makes some gains, but what's still broken? Plenty!
underground.contextual_reframing: The emergency task force is just a smokescreen—real problems aren't solved by automated fixes and hollow promises.
